body:
Comment 2 by **jeffreybolle**: 
Thanks for your comment.

Having read the documentation I can see that this might be considered correct behaviour.
 However I find this very unintuitive and it will lead to a lot of confusion amongst
programmers.  I have gone back and checked what error is retuned from calling Parse in
this manor.  Nil is returned so your statement that t1 should be considered undefined is
not true, furthermore there is no quick way to check that t1 is not a valid time
structure.

Regards,
Jeffrey Bolle
